1.rvw: love it <3 Amazing Soul food! Must try the mac and cheese!

2.rvw: amazing food! Good and cozy vegan place, a lot of options on the menu.

3.rvw: must go! My friend and I went for lunch it was her first time and she loved it!!

4.rvw: Let me start by saying BEST VEGAN restaurant!! Everything here is delicious! They make you feel so welcomed.

5.rvw: Best Vegan burgers in the state!! highly recommend this place.

6.rvw: A variety of vegan foods! Love this place.

7.rvw: Meatless at it's best! Organic Vegan, nuts, appetizers treats and the vegan bars are the most tasteful while eating healthy.

8.rvw: I had the Hillbilly Chili Dogs, Mac n Cheese and Greens! Good Lord! This place is a must visit!!

9.rvw: organic food... very satisfying. Two thumbs up for this place. There was fast, efficient, and courteous service.

10.rvw: Love Life Cafe is my favorite vegan place in Miami. The food is absolutely phenomenal! They have an amazing selection of delicious salads. Their burgers - both veggie and beyond burgers are to die for! My very favorite Love Life dish is their vegan Mac and Cheese. I also recommend their blue sangria!! Bring your friends and share a pitcher - its definitely worth it!!  Excellent service as well - FAST!
